columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the record was generated

columns.name: AccountId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account in the source application

columns.name: AccountType
columns.description: Type of user account, indicating its general role like User, SystemPrincipal

columns.name: AccountDisplayName
columns.description: Name displayed in the address book entry for the account user. This is usually a combination of the given name, middle initial, and surname of the user.

columns.name: AccountUpn
columns.description: Alternate ID, email, or name for the account in the source application

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of activity that triggered the event in the raw format received from the source application

columns.name: ActionFailureReason
columns.description: Information explaining why the recorded action failed

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IP address assigned to the device and used during related network communications

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: User agent information from the web browser or other client application

columns.name: TargetObjects
columns.description: List of the target objects of this activity. Target object can be user, group, role, domain, application, and more.

columns.name: Application
columns.description: The source application where this event was received from

columns.name: ApplicationEventId
columns.description: Raw event ID provided by the source application

columns.name: ApplicationSessionId
columns.description: Raw session ID provided by the source application

columns.name: RawEventData
columns.description: Full raw event information from the source application in JSON format

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional information about the entity or event
